website_summaries.verdict: A different style of floor lamp that will provide great illumination.
pros: Great way to light up a large space with a few halogen light bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, and arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product looks beautiful, however, as others have indicated, it is poorly made, and mine arrived with multiple issues. The fabric was torn at the top, and 2 interior rods which support the fabric structure, were bent, I think I'm going to repair it myself because I really like the look, but I would not recommend this to others, nor would I buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this purchase. Came already put together. Wasn't 2 hard to figure out how to put the bulbs in. Was going to buy 2. Bought only 1 for now. Wish it was alittle taller but i knew it wasn't b4 i got it. No regrets except to say i should have bought both. Now the price has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Tyannti

customer_reviews.title: this lamp is Amazing! I don’t mind a little imperfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp slightly damaged first off but..... regardless, this lamp is Amazing! I don’t mind a little imperfection . I’m so glad I purchased it. I Love this lamp! It’s huge! It’s Elegant ! It’s Everything this lady was hoping for! Thanks again Amazon! You folks Rock! I Love Amazon so much!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GReat,,Modern Lamp,,but are they shipping dammaged?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp. Very modern gives off plenty of soft light. But ours arrived chipped too as others have said. I wonder if these ship chipped. Could be left overs from a retail environment. Great style lamp though. We fixed the small chip with a sharpie:)
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: I know better next
customer_reviews.text: Really brighten up our livingroom where we have no ceiling laughed, ,,,builders. I know better next time
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Palasciano

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The style is beautiful enough, but the warm, intimate glow it gives off is perfect for my taste! So excellent I had to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. It is light and easy to move and looks beautiful when it is lit and when it is not. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: farout

customer_reviews.title: perfect size love it its a great size they also ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect size love it its a great size they also have this in a smaller size for night stands its a good lamp I get comments all the time when people see this in my room.
customer_reviews.author: BetterBeHD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am SO pleased with this lamp! It provides PLENTY of light. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: C+D

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice warm light. And it was much cheaper then in other online shops.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin 77

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, Very professional company
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Small issue with ordering due to typo in description but company handled everything in a professional manner and to my satisfaction. Would defiantly order from them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The most elegant lamp I've ever owned. It surpasses my expectation and its own. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: alphonso gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking floor lamp. Adds a bit of modern class to my dining room. Well made too!
customer_reviews.author: SSiesta

customer_reviews.title: looks exactly like what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: No assembly! Lovely, looks exactly like what we wanted. Nice product for price
customer_reviews.author: K. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this lamp. Very modern and artsy. Nice quality. My husband guessed I paid $500 for it. Wasn't he pleasantly surprised when it was around $130.
customer_reviews.author: Not for me

customer_reviews.title: Love it otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than I expected, but I ignored the measurements listed. Love it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilis

customer_reviews.title: Delivered - damaged
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is beautiful but it has arrived damaged in several places. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the quality & size but this lamp changed the whole ambiance of our apartment. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TFoxx

customer_reviews.title: Beautyyfull  lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Looks beautyfull with warm light. Everyting is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light! Ordered just one but loved it so ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light! Ordered just one but loved it so much I had to order a second shortly after. No assembly, perfect size, beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful and well made. I even bought a matching table lamp.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: CUTE LAMP
customer_reviews.text: I WISH IT WAS TALLER BUT ITS NICE AND EASY TO PUT UP GOT IT IN MY LIVING ROOM IN A CORNER TO CUTE...
customer_reviews.author: nikegirls

customer_reviews.title: While I love the lamp and it looks modern
customer_reviews.text: While I love the lamp and it looks modern, it arrived chipped and the paint had come off from the black part where the shade rests.I kept it because there was non left for me to exchange and amazon gave me $30 credit. I will color the chipped part with a permanent marker. The lamp itself is beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Louiza

product_meta.title: Deco 79 60005 Wood Floor lamp, 48" H
product_meta.description: 48" Contemporary striated beige square shade luminaire Floor Lamp, mounted on espresso finish wood look cubed sculptural base.
feature_bullets: A luminaire floor lamp made of MDF
Perfect floor lamp for modern lounges and living rooms
Has a cubed sculptural base in a rich espresso finish
